Package com.intellij.util.indexing

Class MemoryIndexStorage<Key,Value>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.util.indexing.MemoryIndexStorage<Key,Value>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexStorage<Key,Value>, VfsAwareIndexStorage<Key,Value>, java.io.Flushable

    public class MemoryIndexStorage<Key,Value>
extends java.lang.Object
implements VfsAwareIndexStorage<Key,Value>
    This storage is needed for indexing yet unsaved data without saving those changes to 'main' backend storage
